knowledge.question: This networking OSI layer establishes, manages and terminates connections between applications
explanation: Layer 2 is where data packets are encoded and decoded into bits. It furnishes transmission protocol knowledge and management and handles errors in the physical layer.
Layer 3 provides switching and routing technologies, creating logical paths
Layer 5 establishes, manages and terminates connections between applications
Layer 1 conveys the bit stream - electrical impulse, light or radio signal through the network at the electrical and mechanical level.
